data.message: how to delete email address on my acct

replies.message: Great question, Sarai! You can add or remove email addresses from your account by following these steps in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1Q0l2eu. -Sidney

Would be nice is you answered my question that was asked 12 hours ago.  I see you respond to "we love facebook" quotes that do not need a response but answering a question that is a legitimate one because you guys made changes and things do not work anymore gets ignored
Thanks for reaching out, Jim! You can find out how to download your Facebook data, including photos, from our Help Center here: http://on.fb.me/1Q0xNWh. -Sidney

I asked about bulk downloading. I already know how to click and download one at a time. There were apps/programs that people had that would do this since facebook doesn't seem to want to put that feature in. Now every app/program I find all say that they do not work after you guys made changes to stop them from working. So the question is how do I bulk download MY pictures. If you guys eliminated the ability to do that them I will download them one at a time and then have them stored on a site that does allow bulk download such as Google+ and pass that word to everyone I know to use a site that allows them unhampered access to their pictures
